message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its worth of $10000 to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9500. This offer is exclusive and designed to ensure you have the chance to secure this exceptional item at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your collection with our top-tier offering.
